description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for one (1) Senior Leadership Development Consultant to support the Director General Military Careers (DGMC) in the development of succession planning and talent management policies and programs.
full_summary:
# Senior Leadership Development Consultant
## Government of Canada Tender Announcement

**Solicitation Number:** W2282-24-AA021
**Publication Date:** 2024-05-27
**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-06-17, 14:00:00 (local time)
**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-07-15
**Expected Contract End Date:** 2025-03-31

The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Senior Leadership Development Consultant to provide expertise in developing succession planning and talent management policies and programs for the Director General Military Careers (DGMC).

**Contract Details:**

*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) under a Supply Arrangement
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Traditional
*   **Selection Criteria:** The highest combined rating of technical merit and price
*   **Trade Agreements:** The procurement is subject to various trade agreements, including but not limited to, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

**Geographic Scope:**

*   **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contact Information:**

*   **Name:** Lieutenant-Commander Sarah Hodder, CD
*   **Email:** Sarah.Hodder@ecn.forces.gc.ca
*   **Phone:** (555) 555-5555
*   **Address:** 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada

Note:
*   The tender closing date and time are specified in local time.

The above text has been rewritten to be more concise and organized. It has also been rephrased to be clearer and more professional. The most important information has been highlighted, and irrelevant details have been excluded.

Let me know if you need any further assistance. I can also make sure that the rewritten document meets your accessibility requirements if this is a concern for your application. Just let me know how I can adjust the output to better meet your requirements. 

For example, you could ask me to increase the font size, reduce the color contrast, or format date and time headers as headers. I am here to provide high-quality support. All you need to do is let me know what I can do to better support your needs. Thank you in advance for your feedback and guidance. 

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Technical Writer
